string-array.name: reason_data
string-array.item: NEGATIVE_ADJUST|EXPIRED_RETURN_TO_SUPPLIER|Drugs in quarantine have expired, returned to Supplier
NEGATIVE_ADJUST|LOANS_DEPOSIT|Loans made from a health facility deposit
POSITIVE_ADJUST|CUSTOMER_RETURN|Returns from Customers(HF and dependent wards)
POSITIVE_ADJUST|EXPIRED_RETURN_FROM_CUSTOMER|Returns of expired drugs (HF and dependent wards)
POSITIVE_ADJUST|LOANS_RECEIVED|Loans received at the health facility deposit
POSITIVE_ADJUST|RETURN_FROM_QUARANTINE|Returns from Quarantine, in the case of quarantined product being fit for use
NEGATIVE_ADJUST|INVENTORY_NEGATIVE|Inventory correction in case of over stock on Stock card (Stock on hand is less than stock in stock card)
POSITIVE_ADJUST|INVENTORY_POSITIVE|Inventory correction in case of under stock on Stock card (Stock on hand is more than stock in stock card)
